DST.content: Lacoue-Labarthe’s warning (la mise en garde) of désistance, of traps everywhere, not protective, stands watch (veille) so you don’t forget you’re exposed on this and that side > exposure does not miss you (ne vous manquera pas) or me

presupposes a contract, alliance, fidelity to the ineluctable, this terrifying form, the already there before me, that which lends itself to all figures and schemas; could there be fidelity w/out the faith called for in this dissymmetry [Levinas]?
fidelity to the very thing that you who besiege me (qui m’assiégez si nécessairement) couldn’t, did not, avoid (est-ce que cela revient au même?)
